articles.title: Watch live tonight: Rocket Lab launching satellite rideshare mission @ 12:43 am ET - Space.com
articles.description: The launch window opens Thursday (June 11) at 12:43 a.m. EDT (0443 GMT).
articles.content:
Rocket Lab is planning to launch several satellites into orbit early Thursday (June 11) morning for a rideshare mission dubbed "Don't Stop Me Now." 
The private spaceflight company's Electron rocket… [+5053 chars]
